title: rito please address "tattle" reporting
body: i've recently come to notice that players are going around reporting anyone they dont like or reporting for technically legitimate but petty reasons hoping something sticks the trouble with this is. because of report trolls. neutral players who rage occasionally are being treated unfairly and are getting banned just as quickly as people who are actually toxic it's one thing to report someone who is being constantly negative. however it's another thing for people to go looking for people who slip up and report just to tattle.

replies.body: Rito should either take out the verb abuse ban choice or remove the option to not censor chat... simple as that. whats that, they said a bad word? well if you didn't take off your filter then you'd just see stars and would have no reason to report them.

you probably dont like the post about how some guy likes to report anyone who says 'ez' after the game?

im sorry to say it has 120+ votes already.  pretty sad imo
Don't break the rules "occasionally", and you won't have any problems.
